text: An integrated asset management firm in Conshohocken is looking to add a Programmer to their team. This organization manages assets for institutions and individuals and directly manages hedge fund strategies for access to alternative risks as portfolio diversifiers. The person who joins this team will need to have technical programming experience, specifically in

p.2: We helped this firm add five people to their team over the past two years and would be more than happy to elaborate on the company's culture.

li: Quant Programmers are responsible for the development, maintenance, documentation, and improvement of code that the firm uses to perform data and investment analysis
li.1: Develop existing code (primarily developed in MATLAB) as well as new code going forward
li.2: Manage databases and automate analysis workflows

li.1: Strong academic achievement with an undergraduate degree in Computer science, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, or related fields
li.3: Additional programming experience and skills with tools/applications such as Python, R, and SQL are preferred.
li.4: Experience developing tools/systems to perform data/business analysis is preferred
